about_the_game:
Lead your herd in this chaotic puzzle game where you use all of the tools at your disposal in order to "Guide" your animals into their pens.

You will have to navigate various hazards including predators and cliffs.

Some of the tools you have at your disposal include Fire which animals naturally avoid, launch pads to grant your animals the ability of temporary flight, windmakers, and barriers in order to manipulate their movements.

This demo contains 7 Levels where you can learn the basic mechanics.
